_meanings:
{@--1@} To churn, 
produce by churning; (<ab>oft.</ab> with two
<ab>acc.</ab>). {#suDAM sAgaraM mamaMTuH#} or {#devAsurEramf#}
{#namaMbuniDirmamaMTe#} <ls>Ki. 5. 30.</ls>

{@--2@} To 
agitate, shake, stir round or up, turn
up and down; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); {#tasmAt#}
{#samudrAdiva maTyamAnAt#} <ls>R. 16. 79.</ls>
